participant_1.background:
I'm a survivor and I'm dedicated to my passions.
when i have nothing else to do , i read books.
I am a writer who uses my travels as inspiration for my work.
I'm the one always tripping over my own two feet while running track.
i love to go to the lake.

participant_2.background:
I have a box of letters from my parents that I keep safe.
I find that spending time in the gym helps me to take care of both my mind and my body.
My feet hurt after long runs in my boots.
i talk very fast.
I remember singing along to Queens of the Stone Age with my sisters in the car on long road trips.

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to tonight?
Just hanging out, reading a book. What about you?
Right now I'm just finishing up work. I'm a writer, and I'm working on a new book.
That's awesome! What's the book about?
It's about a woman who travels the world and finds inspiration in different places.
That sounds really interesting! I love to travel.
Me too! I've been to a lot of different places, but I'm always looking for new places to explore.
I'm the same way. I love to see new things and meet new people.
I think that's one of the best things about travel. It can really open your eyes to the world.
I agree! It's amazing how much you can learn from different cultures.
I'm glad you agree. I think travel is one of the best things a person can do.
